verses.verse: And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> unto the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of N'vo <S%H5015><s%>, to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah <S%H6449><s%>, that is over against <S%H6440><s%> Yericho <S%H3405><s%>. And the YY <S%H3068><s%> shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him all the land <S%H776><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, unto Dan <S%H1835><s%>,

And all Naftali <S%H5321><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, and M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, and all the land <S%H776><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, unto the utmost <S%H314><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>,

And the south <S%H5045><s%>, and the plain <S%H3603><s%> of the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Yericho <S%H3405><s%>, the city <S%H5892><s%> of palm trees <S%H8558><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H5899><s%>, unto Zoar <S%H6820><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, This is the land <S%H776><s%> which I sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto Avraham <S%H85><s%>, unto Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, and unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it unto thy seed <S%H2233><s%>: I have caused thee to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it with thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, but thou shalt not go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thither.

So Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, according to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And he buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him in a valley <S%H1516><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, over against <S%H4136><s%> Bethpeor <S%H1047><s%>: but no man <S%H376><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of his sepulchre <S%H6900><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> was an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he died <S%H4194><s%>: his eye <S%H5869><s%> was not dim <S%H3543><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, nor his natural force <S%H3893><s%> abated <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: so the days <S%H3117><s%> of weeping <S%H1065><s%> and mourning <S%H60><s%> for Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> were ended <S%H8552><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> was full <S%H4392><s%> of the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%>; for Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> had laid <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> upon him: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, and did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And there arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not a prophet <S%H5030><s%> since <S%H5750><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> like unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%>,

In all the signs <S%H226><s%> and the wonders <S%H4159><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and to all his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and to all his land <S%H776><s%>,

And in all that mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and in all the great <S%H1419><s%> terror <S%H4172><s%> which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> shewed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
